Message: Stort tillykke til Johanne Schmidt-Nielsen og @redbarnetdk Jeg glæder mig til samarbejdet - og til vores fælles kamp for at sikre børns rettigheder i udviklingslandene, herunder ikke mindst et stop for børneægteskaber #dkaid #dkpol https://twitter.com/redbarnetdk/status/1121393247627116545

Nye OECD-tal viser, at #DK igen er ét blandt kun fem vestlige lande, der leverer på FN-målet om en udviklingsbistand på 0,7% af BNI. RT @Ulla_Tornaes: Fra 2015 og til i dag er asylstrømmen til Danmark raslet ned. Derfor kan vi i dag hjælpe mange flere flygtninge i nærområ…

Fra 2015 og til i dag er asylstrømmen til Danmark raslet ned. Derfor kan vi i dag hjælpe mange flere flygtninge i nærområderne. Med Mette Frederiksen og @Spolitik ved roret vil vi sætte den udvikling i stå #dkpol #dkaid https://www.jv.dk/indland/Venstre-53300-flere-asylansoegere-med-roed-politik/artikel/2704548

#DK welcomes the appointment of Mr David Malpass as new president of @WorldBank The bank is essential in realizing #SDGs & #ParisAgreement, eliminating poverty, closing the gender gaps, fighting #ClimateChange & investing in human beings #HumanCapital #EndPoverty #dkpol #dkaid

Thank you for a very constructive meeting, @MissTikhala, and for all the great work that you and your colleagues are doing in order to ensure that #SheDecides across the globe 🌍 #dkaid #dkpol #CPD52 https://twitter.com/misstikhala/status/1113095846952931330
My sincere apologies for the mistyping - I was referring to the tragic crash of flight ET302

I am proud to announce that #DK will join #Kenya and @UNFPA in co-hosting the ICPD+25 high-level conference taking place in Nairobi 12-14 November. We have to ensure that every girl and woman have the right to decide freely over her own body #dkaid #dkpol #shedecides #CPD2019

We live in a world where some people believe that young girls are too young for sexuality education but old enough to get married. This is absurd. For this reason I have decided to allocate 2.3 mil. USD to @UNFPA for its out of school-project in West Africa #dkaid #dkpol #CPD2019 https://t.co/Y5Mm0v2MMf

The human losses in the #ET301 crash were immense. As I visited Africa Hall in Addis Ababa yesterday I had the honour to write my condolences for the families & friends of the UN staff, whose lives were lost in the crash. My thoughts are with all loved ones in grief #dkaid #dkpol https://t.co/I9xv34qwH7

Signing a new agreement with @UNDP & @UN_Women to release US$ 4.5 million in support of governance & gender in Ethiopia 🇪🇹 Only by allowing girls & women to enjoy their full democratic rights can Ethiopia benefit from the potential that is half the population #dkaid #sdg5 #sdg16 https://t.co/Nocx9fbIoY

Dr Seleshi Bekele, minister for Water, Irrigation & Energy, Ethiopia 🇪🇹 #dkpol #dkaid https://t.co/PnttQSMW0h

Exciting & inspiring to meet the strong women from @YellowMvt together with Crown Princess Mary of Denmark. We have to make sure that #SheDecides also in #Ethiopia - ensuring girls’ & women’s rights is key to reach #sdg5 & to create a sustainable future #DKaid #dkpol @BlenaSahilu https://t.co/E80GSCVSHp

Situationen i #Mozambique er dybt tragisk. Hundredetusinder er ramt. @BRSdk’s dygtige folk er på vej, og #DK har indtil videre afsat over 15 mio. kr. til #dkaid Mere kan komme på tale, når der er overblik over katastrofens relle omfang. Vi følger situationen tæt #dkpol https://twitter.com/forsvarsmin/status/1109505450670723074

@helenehagel @rasmusnordqvist @UNFCCC @alternativet_ #DK følger #Parisagreement i ord & handling. Også når det gælder rapportering af klimafinansiering. De 4,6 mia. kr. er et solidt bidrag til USD 100 mia. målsætningen

Bekymret for den alvorlige situation i Mozambique, Malawi og Zimbabwe efter cyklonen #Idai. Tæt dialog med DK partnere for at hjælpe. Har på #FL19 allokeret DKK 150 mio #dkaid til FNs Centrale Nødhjælpsfond #CERF, der hjælper ofrene med en ny indsats på USD 20 mio. #dkpol @UNOCHA

Stolt af at #DK skal lede indsats på #energitransition frem til klimatopmødet i #FN Stor anerkendelse af #DK som grønt foregangsland & multilateral brobygger. Bygger på #P4GPartnerships, succes med mobilisering af private investorer & kompetencer inden for energi #dkgreen #dkpol

What is the status of women’s rights globally? Today my colleague Eva Kjer Hansen is in #NYC, leading an impressive #Danish delegation fighting for an ambitious #CSW63 outcome for women everywhere. Good luck to @phumzileunwomen & @UN_Women! #DKatCSW63 #SRHR @unwomenordic #sdg5

Happy to announce a Danish contribution of DKK 50 mio to @UNICEF Safe School Initiative in the Sahelregion. During my travel in the region the last days I have witnessed firsthand the urgent need for a massive investment in especially girls’ education in the Sahel #dkaid #dkpol https://t.co/GYYWKsP3q3

På dansk jord igen efter et besøg i Niger. Meget positivt at opleve, hvordan #DKs støtte til #EUs Trustfond bidrager til træning af landets gendarmeri, så Niger bedre kan bekæmpe menneskesmuglere og dermed dæmme op for irregulær migration mod Europa #dkpol #dkaid #EUTF https://t.co/ZguC4ZE0hF

Piger skal i skole. Også i #BurkinaFaso, som jeg besøgte ifm #8marts, og hvor bl.a. islamistisk terror har lukket over 1000 skoler med store konsekvenser for pigers skolegang. Vi må aldrig føje os for terror og islamisme. Se mere på DR #dkaid #dkpol https://www.dr.dk/tv/se/tv-avisen/tv-avisen-24/tv-avisen-2019-03-08#!/00:12:50

Thank you for a brillant trip - and for your strong commitment to education and girls’ rights, @AliceAlbright #dkaid #dkpol #sdg5 #SheDecides https://twitter.com/alicealbright/status/1104040647382781952

I #Sahel får en kvinde i gns. knap 6 børn, hver 3. pige kommer ikke i skole og halvdelen af pigerne er gift, før de fylder 18. Derfor markerer jeg #KvindernesInternationaleKampdag i #BurkinaFaso, hvor #DK støtter bl.a. pigers skolegang #sdg5 #dkpol #dkaid https://pov.international/danmark-kaemper-for-kvinder/

Klimakamp er også kvindekamp. I udviklingslandene er det oftest kvinderne, som rammes hårdest af klimaforandringerne. Derfor skal vi udnytte kvindernes erfaring og viden i den globale klimakamp https://www.altinget.dk/energi/artikel/toernaes-og-folkekirkens-noedhjaelp-klimakamp-er-ogsaa-kvindekamp #dkpol #dkaid #KvindernesInternationaleKampdag “

Many civilians are suffering due to the security situation in the Northern #BurkinaFaso and the need for humanitarian assistance is urgent. Happy to announce a new contribution of USD 2,2 mio from #DK to @WFP during my visit to #BurkinaFaso today #dkpol #dkaid

Today, on this #InternationalWomensDay2019, I am visiting #BurkinaFaso and some of the girls #DK is fighting for to secure equal access to #education. Proud that #DK together with our partners is making a huge difference for girls and women in Africa #dkaid #dkpol https://t.co/NL3PQBo8Jz
